item.title: Mammoth sign center Cooley to $80M extension
item.description: The Mammoth have signed Logan Cooley to an eight-year, $80 million contract, locking down the center through the 2033-34 season.

item.title: Jackson: 'Busted' Melo pairing forced Knicks exit
item.description: Hall of Fame coach Phil Jackson discussed his failed relationship with former Knicks star Carmelo Anthony in a new book, saying the "busted" relations...

item.title: Jordan: Load management never should happen
item.description: Michael Jordan didn't hold back on load management in the NBA, saying on NBC: "It shouldn't be needed, first and foremost."

item.title: Patriots trade White to 49ers, Dugger to Steelers
